text: Alfred Spiro Moisiu (; born 1 December 1929) is an Albanian politician. He was the fourth President of the Republic of Albania from 2002-2007\. He is the eldest son of famed Albanian Army general Spiro Moisiu. ==Honors== * Knight Grand Cross of the Croatian Grand Order of King Tomislav (, July 2, 2007), "For outstanding contribution to the promotion of friendship and development co-operation between the Republic of Croatia and the Republic of Albania." * Grand Cross of the Order of Vytautas the Great (27 March 2007)Lithuanian Presidency Website, Search form * Honorary Knight Grand Cross of the Order of St Michael and St George ==References== ==Other websites== * Photo Category:1929 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Albania
title: Alfred Moisiu
